actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reports, the other have thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged.

official_title: A bill to eliminate the congressional budget process, abolish the Committee on the Budget of the Senate and the Committee on the Budget of the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.
short_title: Congressional Budget Process Repeal Act of 1983

summary.text: Congressional Budget Process Repeal Act of 1983 - Amends the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to eliminate the congressional budget process and abolish the Committees on the Budget of the House of Representatives and the Senate.

titles.title: Congressional Budget Process Repeal Act of 1983
A bill to eliminate the congressional budget process, abolish the Committee on the Budget of the Senate and the Committee on the Budget of the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.
